data.eml:eml: Vatellini Sharp (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae) from Brazil: two new species, new records, and a checklist

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Braga, Rafael Benzi, Ferreira-Jr, Nelson (2016): Vatellini Sharp (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae) from Brazil: two new species, new records, and a checklist. Zootaxa 4111 (1): 77-91, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.1.7
